author.description: Kyle Flemmer | writer, publisher, digital media artist | http://objkt.com/profile/kflemmer

text: Bought this fabulous book yesterday, Arcade Game Typography by Toshi Omagari. Highly recommended for pixel artists and video games enthusiasts!
